text: @maddow I went out to my local Supermarket and nobody was buying or even going near the fresh meat & poultry. Fresh frozen fruit was basically empty. I'm in rural Lake County CA and 1/2 the Supermarket shelves were empty. #COVID19 is real & we are not testing enough people.
